fragment.template:
\t/** \t * Enable clock to $(_Class) \t */ \tstatic void enableClock() { #ifdef PCC \t PccInfo::enable$(_Class)Clock(); #else \t $(clockEnable) #endif \t}
\t/** \t * Disable clock to $(_Class) \t */ \tstatic void disableClock() { #ifdef PCC \t PccInfo::disable$(_Class)Clock(); #else \t $(clockDisable) #endif \t}\n\n
